channel.title: How to change pk points value for item PI
channel.description: how do i do the above? i want to edit the points needed the buy the items in the pk shop plz help

item.title: How to change pk points value for item PI
item.dc:creator: @David321 David321
item.description:
@David321 wrote:

TryToLearn:

The specialvalue is that it changes from coins to the value u put in there, in this case PK points.

It is in Shopassistant.java

Read full topic

item.title: How to change pk points value for item PI
item.dc:creator: @thekingpin thekingpin
item.description:
@thekingpin wrote:

why step 3 i find that all other open source servers are shit, have glitches, or the coders are idiots and dont know about real rs

but thanks i guess, ill try

EDIT I FOUND THIS:

} else if (c.myShopId == 29) { if (c.pkPoints >= getSpecialItemValue(itemID)) { if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0){ c.pkPoints -= getSpecialItemValue(itemID); c.getItems().addItem(itemID,1); c.getItems().resetItems(3823);

what is getspecialitemvalue? and anyone know where i can find it as i searched but to no avail

@Team_Rocket wrote:

  1. Search for your Points int.
  2. Use the name of your Points to find the values.
  3. Stop using PI.
